name: Basil Hawkins
text: On K.O. Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck and play up to 1 {Supernovas} type Character card with 2000 power or less other than [Basil Hawkins]. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck and play up to 1 {Supernovas} type Character card with 2000 power or less other than [Basil Hawkins]. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
